sourcesContent:
import { Box, Typography, Grid, Container, useTheme } from "@mui/material"; import { tokens } from "../../theme"; import LiquidTanks from "..//invoices"; // Adjust the path as necessary import Header from "../../components/Header"; const Dashboard = () => { const theme = useTheme(); const colors = tokens(theme.palette.mode); // MainComponent content (directly added here) const shipInfo = `

My ship:
IMO: 9612636
General vessel type: Cargo
MMSI: 245179000
Call sign: PCRR
Gross Tonnage: 19848
Summer DWT: 6500 t
Length Overall x Breadth Extreme: 139.4 x 44.4 m `; const contactInfo = ` Contact info:
Van der leun
info@royalvanderleun.com
+31 (0)184 413 288
Website
instagram
facebook
`; const locationInfo = `
Location:
Position received: 2024-01-13 14:10 LT (UTC -5)
Area: USEC - US East Coast
Navigational Status: Moored
Speed/Course: 0 kn / 16 Â°
Reported Destination: SOUTHFORK WINDFARM `; const formatText = (text) => (
); // Styling for the title box and the blue strip const titleBoxStyle = { width: '100%', height: '60px', backgroundColor: '#f36617', color: 'white', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', fontSize: '24px', fontWeight: 'bold', marginBottom: '16px', }; const blueStripStyle = { bottom: 0, left: 0, width: '100%', height: '60px', // Height of the strip backgroundColor: '#1e54ae', // Full-width blue strip zIndex: 1000, // Ensure it is above other content }; const BoxComponent = ({ backgroundColor, children }) => ( {children} ); return ( {/* HEADER */}
{/* GRID & CHARTS */} {/* ROW 1 */} {/* MainComponent content directly embedded */} Home {formatText(shipInfo)} {formatText(locationInfo)} {formatText(contactInfo)} {/* Other box content */} {/* Other boxes */} ); }; export default Dashboard;
